description: Saag paneer is a great dish for packing in lots of different greens, no one will know and the end result is nutritious and delicious.
name: Super Green Saag Paneer Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the paneer back into the pan and cook for 2 minutes before serving. Serve with lemon wedges to squeeze over, if desired.
